scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run server:prod
scripts.db:init: npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.db:test: npm run db:init && npm run db:reset
scripts.test:dev: npm run db:test && npx prisma db seed && npm run dev
scripts.test:prod: npm run db:test && npx prisma db seed && npm run prod
